alert.note: Alert for Bennett County Area; Mellette and Todd Counties; Pine Ridge Area; Tripp County (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued January 31 at 1:45AM MST until January 31 at 6:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 326, 333, 334, AND 335 ACROSS SOUTHERN SOUTH DAKOTA... .Very warm, windy and dry conditions are expected across southern portions of South Dakota Monday afternoon, as a strong cold front moves through the Northern Plains. Winds will initially be out of the southwest...then switch to the northwest behind the cold front. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON MST /1 PM CST/ TODAY TO 6 PM MST /7 PM CST/ THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 326, 333, 334, AND 335... The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon MST /1 PM CST/ today to 6 PM MST /7 PM CST/ this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 326 Pine Ridge Area, 333 Bennett County Area, 334 Mellette and Todd Counties and 335 Tripp County. * WINDS...West 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity would produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Bennett County Area; Mellette and Todd Counties; Pine Ridge Area; Tripp County
